entities.name: river
entities.description: River is a code name for Lee, mentioned by Ron.

entities.name: lee
entities.description: Lee is one of the regular contributors with a code name 'River'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the regular contributors and explained that Lee's code name is 'River'.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a regular contributor who asked Ron to be quiet.

entities.name: royal
entities.description: Royal is one of the contributors mentioned by Lee before reporting news.

entities.name: romulus
entities.description: Romulus is another contributor mentioned by Lee before reporting news.

entities.name: ted tonks
entities.description: Ted Tonks was a person who was murdered and reported on the Wizarding Wireless Network News.

entities.name: dirk cresswell
entities.description: Dirk Cresswell was another person who was murdered and reported on the Wizarding Wireless Network News.

entities.name: gornuk
entities.description: Gornuk is a goblin who was killed.

entities.name: dean thomas
entities.description: Dean Thomas is a Muggleborn person who may have escaped with another goblin.

relationships.description: Ron explained that Lee's code name is 'River'.
Hermione asked Ron to be quiet.
Lee mentioned Royal before reporting news.
Lee mentioned Romulus before reporting news.
Ted Tonks and Dirk Cresswell were murdered together.
Gornuk and Dean Thomas may have traveled with Ted Tonks and Dirk Cresswell before they were killed.
Lee reported the death of Gornuk.
Lee mentioned that Dean Thomas may have escaped with another goblin.
